traits.name: Flyby
entries: The scion doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (6/Day)
entries: If the scion fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The scion has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Siege Monster
entries: The scion deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The scion makes one attack using Lightning Sword or Hailstone, as well as two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Lightning Sword
entries: Melee atk +18 to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10 damage) force damage plus 22 (4d10 damage) lightning damage.

actions.name: Hailstone
entries: Ranged atk +18 to hit, range 120/480 ft., one target. 32 (4d10 + 10 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 18 (4d8 damage) cold damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 26 Strength saving throw or have the {@condition prone} condition.

actions.name: Slam
entries: Melee atk +18 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 36 (4d12 + 10 damage) force damage.
